original_text: Some of us trust God with strong faith. We must help those believers whose faith is weaker. We must be patient with them. We should not just do things that will make us happy ourselves. Samuel 16:1. Jesus was born many years after Jesse and David lived on the earth. The ‘root of Jesse’ means that Jesus belonged to Jesse and David's family. See Matthew 1:1-16. But it means also that Jesse and David come from Jesus. Jesus caused them to be alive, as a plant grows up from its root. Jesus is God. He has always been alive in God's home beyond the earth. He made everything and everyone. Samuel 16:1. Jesus was born many years after Jesse and David lived on the earth. The ‘root of Jesse’ means that Jesus belonged to Jesse and David's family. See Matthew 1:1-16. But it means also that Jesse and David come from Jesus. Jesus caused them to be alive, as a plant grows up from its root. Jesus is God. He has always been alive in God's home beyond the earth. He made everything and everyone. Samuel 16:1. Jesus was born many years after Jesse and David lived on the earth. The ‘root of Jesse’ means that Jesus belonged to Jesse and David's family. See Matthew 1:1-16. But it means also that Jesse and David come from Jesus. Jesus caused them to be alive, as a plant grows up from its root. Jesus is God. He has always been alive in God's home beyond the earth. He made everything and everyone.
korean_text: 믿음이 강한 우리는 마땅히 믿음이 약한 자의 약점을 담당하고 자기를 기쁘게 하지 아니할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Some of us trust God with strong faith
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 중 어떤 사람들은 강한 믿음으로 하나님을 신뢰합니다

sentences.original_text: We must help those believers
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그 믿는 사람들을 도와야 합니다

sentences.original_text: whose faith is weaker
We must be patient with them
We should not just do things
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그냥 일을 해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: that will make us happy ourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 우리 자신들을 행복하게 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Samuel 16:1
Jesus was born many years after
Jesse and David lived on the earth
The 'root of Jesse' means
that Jesus belonged to Jesse and David's family
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 이세와 다윗의 가족에 속했다는 것

sentences.original_text: See Matthew 1:1-16
But it means also
that Jesse and David come from Jesus
Jesus caused them to be alive
as a plant grows up from its root
Jesus is God
He has always been alive
in God's home beyond the earth
He made everything and everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 모든 것과 모든 사람을 만드셨습니다
